snippet.title: Evertried Trailer 2021
snippet.description:
Evertried is a turn-based rogue-lite coming for PC and consoles on Fall 2021.

Co-developed by Lunic Games and the solo programmer Danilo Domingues, with audio by Moonsailor.


Play the DEMO: https://gamejolt.com/games/evertried/566896

Twitter: @EvertriedGame
